config.task_str:

请你帮我找到这些课程，输出格式请参考工作区中的参考格式.xlsx。如果有多种选课方案，请分别保存在不同的Excel文件中。为了保证工作区的干净，请你最终只保留各个选课方案的.xlsx文件，其他多余的excel文件（包括参考格式）都请删除。

function.name: pdf-tools-read_pdf_pages
function.description:
Read content from PDF file for specified page range.

Note: Avoid reading too many pages at once (recommended: <50 pages) to prevent errors.

Args:
    pdf_file_path: Path to the PDF file
    start_page: Starting page number (default: 1)
    end_page: Ending page number (default: 1)

function.name: pdf-tools-get_pdf_info
function.description:
Get basic information about a PDF file including page count.

Args:
    pdf_file_path: Path to the PDF file

function.name: pdf-tools-merge_pdfs
function.description:
Merge multiple PDF files into one.

Args:
    pdf_paths: List of paths to PDF files to merge (in order)
    output_path: Path where the merged PDF will be saved

function.name: pdf-tools-extract_pdf_pages
function.description:
Extract specific pages from a PDF and create a new PDF.

Args:
    source_path: Path to the source PDF file
    page_numbers: List of page numbers to extract (1-indexed)
    output_path: Path where the new PDF will be saved

function.name: pdf-tools-search_pdf_content
function.description:
Search for regex pattern in PDF content and return paginated results.

Args:
    pdf_file_path: Path to the PDF file
    pattern: Regular expression pattern to search for
    page_size: Number of results per page (10-50, default: 10)

Returns:
    Search results with UUID for pagination, or error message

function.name: pdf-tools-search_pdf_next_page
function.description:
Get next page of search results.

Args:
    search_id: Search session ID from previous search

Returns:
    Next page of search results or error message

function.name: pdf-tools-search_pdf_prev_page
function.description:
Get previous page of search results.

Args:
    search_id: Search session ID from previous search

Returns:
    Previous page of search results or error message

function.name: pdf-tools-search_pdf_go_page
function.description:
Go to specific page of search results.

Args:
    search_id: Search session ID from previous search
    page_number: Page number to go to (1-indexed)

Returns:
    Specified page of search results or error message

function.name: pdf-tools-search_pdf_info
function.description:
Get information about a search session.

Args:
    search_id: Search session ID from previous search

Returns:
    Information about the search session

function.name: filesystem-read_file
function.description: Read the complete contents of a file from the file system. Handles various text encodings and provides detailed error messages if the file cannot be read. Use this tool when you need to examine the contents of a single file. Use the 'head' parameter to read only the first N lines of a file, or the 'tail' parameter to read only the last N lines of a file. Only works within allowed directories.

tail.description: If provided, returns only the last N lines of the file

head.description: If provided, returns only the first N lines of the file

function.name: filesystem-read_multiple_files
function.description: Read the contents of multiple files simultaneously. This is more efficient than reading files one by one when you need to analyze or compare multiple files. Each file's content is returned with its path as a reference. Failed reads for individual files won't stop the entire operation. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-write_file
function.description: Create a new file or completely overwrite an existing file with new content. Use with caution as it will overwrite existing files without warning. Handles text content with proper encoding. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-edit_file
function.description: Make line-based edits to a text file. Each edit replaces exact line sequences with new content. Returns a git-style diff showing the changes made. Only works within allowed directories.

oldText.description: Text to search for - must match exactly

dryRun.description: Preview changes using git-style diff format

function.name: filesystem-create_directory
function.description: Create a new directory or ensure a directory exists. Can create multiple nested directories in one operation. If the directory already exists, this operation will succeed silently. Perfect for setting up directory structures for projects or ensuring required paths exist. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-list_directory
function.description: Get a detailed listing of all files and directories in a specified path. Results clearly distinguish between files and directories with [FILE] and [DIR] prefixes. This tool is essential for understanding directory structure and finding specific files within a directory. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-list_directory_with_sizes
function.description: Get a detailed listing of all files and directories in a specified path, including sizes. Results clearly distinguish between files and directories with [FILE] and [DIR] prefixes. This tool is useful for understanding directory structure and finding specific files within a directory. Only works within allowed directories.

sortBy.description: Sort entries by name or size

function.name: filesystem-directory_tree
function.description: Get a recursive tree view of files and directories as a JSON structure. Each entry includes 'name', 'type' (file/directory), and 'children' for directories. Files have no children array, while directories always have a children array (which may be empty). The output is formatted with 2-space indentation for readability. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-move_file
function.description: Move or rename files and directories. Can move files between directories and rename them in a single operation. If the destination exists, the operation will fail. Works across different directories and can be used for simple renaming within the same directory. Both source and destination must be within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-search_files
function.description: Recursively search for files and directories matching a pattern. Searches through all subdirectories from the starting path. The search is case-insensitive and matches partial names. Returns full paths to all matching items. Great for finding files when you don't know their exact location. Only searches within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-get_file_info
function.description: Retrieve detailed metadata about a file or directory. Returns comprehensive information including size, creation time, last modified time, permissions, and type. This tool is perfect for understanding file characteristics without reading the actual content. Only works within allowed directories.

function.name: filesystem-list_allowed_directories
function.description: Returns the list of directories that this server is allowed to access. Use this to understand which directories are available before trying to access files.

function.name: local-python-execute
function.description: Execute Python code directly under the agent workspace, and returns stdout, stderr, return code, and execution time in a structured format.

code.description: Python code to execute (can be directly pasted into a .py file)

filename.description: Filename for the Python file (including .py extension). If not provided, a random UUID will be used.

timeout.description: Maximum execution time in seconds. Cannot exceed 120 seconds. If a value greater than 120 is provided, it will be automatically limited to 120 seconds. Default is 30 seconds.

function.name: local-check_context_status
function.description: 查询当前对话的上下文状态，包括轮数统计、token使用情况、截断历史等信息

function.name: local-manage_context
function.description:
管理对话上下文，通过删除历史消息来释放空间。支持多种策略：
- keep_recent_turns: 保留最近N轮对话
- keep_recent_percent: 保留最近X%的对话  
- delete_first_turns: 删除最早的N轮对话
- delete_first_percent: 删除最早X%的对话

action.description: 要执行的操作，目前只支持truncate

value.description: 数值参数，对于turns方法是轮数，对于percent方法是百分比(0-100)

function.name: local-search_history
function.description: 搜索历史对话记录。支持多个关键词搜索，返回包含所有关键词的记录。支持分页浏览所有结果。

keywords.description: 搜索关键词列表，将查找包含所有关键词的记录

search_id.description: 继续之前的搜索（用于翻页）

function.name: local-view_history_turn
function.description: 查看特定轮次的完整对话内容，包括前后几轮的上下文。

context_turns.description: 同时显示前后几轮的上下文

function.name: local-browse_history
function.description: 按时间顺序浏览历史记录，支持正向或反向浏览。

start_turn.description: 起始轮次（包含），默认从最早开始

end_turn.description: 结束轮次（包含），默认到最新

direction.description: 浏览方向：forward从早到晚，backward从晚到早

function.name: local-history_stats
function.description: 获取历史记录的统计信息，包括总轮数、时间范围、消息类型分布等。

function.name: local-claim_done
function.description: claim the task is done

import re

def parse_time_slot(time_str):
    """解析时间字符串，返回星期和节次"""
    match = re.match(r'([一二三四五六日])\s+(\d+)-(\d+)', time_str)
    if match:
        day = match.group(1)
        start = int(match.group(2))
        end = int(match.group(3))
        return day, list(range(start, end + 1))
    return None, []

def has_time_conflict(course1, course2):
    """检查两门课程是否有时间冲突"""
    day1, slots1 = parse_time_slot(course1['上课时间'])
    day2, slots2 = parse_time_slot(course2['上课时间'])
    
    if day1 != day2:
        return False
    
    return bool(set(slots1) & set(slots2))
